dcterms:creator: A. K. McCallum
K. Nigam
J. Rennie
K. Seymore
dcterms:description: CORA-ML is a dataset used for evaluating graph convolutional networks, consisting of a large attributed graph with nodes representing documents and edges representing citation relationships.
dcterms:title: CORA-ML

dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata

dcterms:description: CiteSeer is a dataset used for collective classification in network data, consisting of a citation network where nodes represent documents and edges represent citations.
dcterms:title: CiteSeer
